title: Leaver Buster OP
body: As soon as i finished patching 5.1 I was placed in "low priority queues" with no warning and without leaving any game within several (~30) games. On top of that I did not receive any notice about how long I will be subdued to these delays. Hopefully this bug can be cleared as I rarely ever afk from games and when I do I always return (afks due to needing to restart computer for whichever reason).
